Blog.post: you were there waiting for me with loves lost thorn in your side i was stuck in wires on the other side of the world you were everything i wanted to be you and everything in between the sad machines the world police...
an instrumental track which kind of resembles shapes.
is it black where you are in the crawl space between me urlLink stars shine black - alternate version
urlLink sorrow - alternate version

cement the soul my blood circulates like metal underneath the last nail of your skin the loneliness leaves me hollow swimming through the shit of chicago never blinking as you melt away face various shapes escape through holes of your smile where everything means nothing is everything at all i try to try to read you i try to try to reach you i try to try to read you and there is nothing at all i love you more than anything and it's killing me inside you're technicolors! you're more mysterious than god

you live the life of a secret movie star behind your world of glass you live the life of a secret movie star or is it just your past could this love ever last or am i dreaming again i could pretend i'm you secretly dance in front of the mirror and you're with me and we're drifting and we're singing and we're dreaming

why do we always end up back in loneliness or in vermont where the quiet never ends christmas was killing me the new year brought you here now you're gone, maybe forever but your scent still is here always all over me the stains are on the sheets this is everything i didn't need blank sheets of nothing coming out of my head reminding me blank sheets are all i am was it something i said am i going out of my head was it something i did and still i wait here until i see you again maybe i'll forget and just pretend you were never here and there is always a scene like this and it still makes me sick when i do this to myself notes: this song is for christopher moser

all i can give to you is all i can't an offering of light forgiveness a reminder of who i was and who i am not it's all a blur again now i can rise above it all before i have to fall backwards upside down i am in another world leaving sadness on brick walls breaking the glass of who i was all i can give to you is all i want an offering of light forgiveness the words until now were all i could feel the night has borne it's presence now i can rise above it all before i have to fall backwards upside down i am in another world leaving sadness on brick walls and breaking the glass of who i was

is it mayhem or bliss out murder or make out with the one formerly known as the star is it glamour or flake out murder or make out you know who you are you've made a mess of things will never be the same dressing coffins for the ones you love you've made a mess of things will never be the same dressing coffins for the ones you adore

i don't want to be the man famous for breaking your heart i don't want to be that man two years later and i'm walking backwards to catch a glimpse of us still counting regrets on fingers and thumbs you were the treasure i never found the loss i'll always pain i don't want to be the man who broke you again and again i don't want to be the man who wakes alone at 74 i don't want to be that ghost i don't want to be the man who spent his life on a lie i don't want to be the man who says i woke the day i died i don't want to be the man famous for breaking your heart i don't want to be that man urlLink i woke up - alternate version

i maybe look clean i maybe pristine i'm so obscene i am dirty... notes: oh how the title of this song is so true, i am indeed dirty, but you would never know on the surface. the song itself is a dumb song, it was recorded in 1 day with 8 other songs.

i'd die to fall in love with you across the ocean across the sky so blue turning heads throwing stones we're beautiful only strangers when we meet still i fall time and time again still i feel time and time again too much too soon too little too late i open my eyes to stay awake in dreams notes: this song was written and recorded in paris, france in my hotel while on vaction in february 2001, falling in love in paris with someone in chicago on valentine's day. this song was recorded 3 times. urlLink i fall - alternate version #1 urlLink i fall - alternate version #2
a cover of a great urlLink magnetic fields song from their album 69 love songs
taking you in like a freight train not a care in this world...
if i could i would... urlLink honey - alternate version

you dance with a ghost i have a headache you whisper at air i think that you have to much to say while spinning in circles and nothing to say as you leave me standing will i never be lost without you...
written and recorded with a group of 8 other songs on chrismas eve in 2001.
another smashing pumpkins cover of one of their most beautiful songs.
fin (end) is an instrumental track of backwards looping acoustic distorted guitars.

this is a cover of the smashing pumpkins disarm, this song means a lot to me, and is essentially how i became such a fan. the lyrics closely resemble my life. a broken boy from a broken home with little or no hope to go on.
this is a cover of my favorite urlLink R.E.M. song from their out of time album. written by berry, buck, mills, stipe

do you curse the day i was born in your bed in the fall i'm the blackbird that caws your death the air when you breathe your last breath your secrets loom like a black cloud i can't escape you reign over me you rain over me mother, you bitch am i free? i will not be your possession blame i will not be your possession blame do you spit at the mirror when you see yourself when you see yourself when you see your selfishness was it worth it the cock of your spanish lover do you feel the love inside do you feel anything at all is there anything in there at all? do you know what you have lost you will never have it again. notes: this song is obviously written for my mother whom i no longer and will probably never speak to again. it was later recorded in 2003 and retitled mother and sorrow.
dream, always nothing dream, always nothing
a simple instrumental track, named after the chords it is constructed of.

there is a photograph i took a year ago it reminds me of a time when we were so sweet we would laugh we could kiss without breathing there was a time we danced a thousand miles oh how we danced with the best of them would you walk with me my stomach is in my throat again i just wanted to tell you how much i love you
notes: an instrumental track. a jazzy organ number.
notes: there are about 10 versions of this song, 1 with vocals which is terrible, and will never see the light of day. this is obviously the instrumental version.
notes: an instrumental song. 1 of a series of experimental tracks i am still to this day working on. they will be the score to a film also in the works under the same name.
(instrumental)
notes: another drew gath original. enough said.
(instrumental)
(instrumental) - a kind of protest song in honor of george w bush and his war on weapons of mass destruction.
notes: a really horrible version of a really nice song, i don't even know why i decided to put it up for you to listen to.

notes: an instrumental track with cheerleaders. i used to live across from a park where cheerleaders would practice their cheers, the weird sound you hear in this song is the cheerleader squad cheering, but of course it was run through processers and sped up to make them sound like robots.

notes: i have no idea what the words to this song are, all i know is it was recorded under the influence of a lot of red wine, and it was supposed to be what sebastian the cat was thinking in his head while i was recording. i am insane.

it was almost the perfect day i watched it fall like sand washed my hands of my fucked up plans and went to sleep to sleep again to wake up to nothing at all to open my eyes to watch me fall to fall into the me i used to know it was the longest day i watched the hourglass i have died time and time again and have bled through the wires of the television to wake up to a headache to wake up so empty and i have watched it all slip away and i will never love again and i will never be the same and i will never love again and i will never be the same urlLink perfect day - alternate version

notes: this song is one of those songs, where someone writes something stupid after drinking too much and then just fucking around with instruments, and then actually taking the time to record and waste precious tape. i also think i was watching a raisin in the sun while recording the keyboard parts. lyrics by andrew gath.

this is the scene where you walking down the street and the world is blowing up behind you this is the scene when you wake up in a dream to wake up to you dreaming this is the scene where your eyes start to bleed they fall and you cannot see this isn't happening this isn't love urlLink nice dream - alternate version
(instrumental)
(instrumental)
(instrumental)
a cover of Pink Floyd's Mother, this was done purely by accident, only because the vocal effect i was fooling around with sounded similar to the one they used i think.
(see the lyrics to apple)
urlLink lights out - part II urlLink lights out - part III
urlLink i can feel today - alternate version #1 urlLink i can feel today - alternate version #2

go on get out of town while you still can you may be running all your life but it's the only way you know how to live and still you're tired of everything turning up the same and pulling you down urlLink ghost - alternate version
elliott smith...
(instrumental)- a nice frenchy folkie song with accordians musettes, and piano.
notes: nice vocoder vox and sad guitar, i don't remember the lyrics...
(instrumental)
(instrumental)

i wrote this book, "learning to drive" i've spent this life upside down drinking water eating food everyday something new i am a whore i am a whore just sucking the life out of everthing i touch until it breaks just pushing until it's fake i want more i was the blackest of sheep fucking off and around wasting skin wasting cells i couldn't taste the moments i couldn't catch my breath but i could taste the flowers and emptiness i could taste the sunshine of life i could taste the flowers and there you were delicate and new drinking water and eating food and doing time and doing time now urlLink car crash - alternate version

you may have british teeth and greasy hair you may have desert skin but i don't care you may smoke cigarettes and swear too much but i love you just the same i'm not one to fall for vanity oh your dirty words complete me i love it when we walk the streets when they look at you and question me when they look at you and question me is he serious how could he be but i'm not one to fall for vanity oh your dirty words complete me you may have british teeth but i don't care.

i am standing still burning a box of beautiful things everything in flames! and i am watching myself looking for something i have never had everything has changed i stand up just to fall again holding on to something i will never have and that's just how it is always talking to hear myself senseless words and arrogance falling forward just watch it end or descend into this whatever this is i am running up a hill always running from myself i need help to stop me from cutting the skin looking for something that i once had forever gone i am standing still burning a box of beautiful things everything in flames and i am watching myself looking for something i have never had everything has changed. notes: possibly the most recorded song of mine, everytime i record a new song i end up re-recording this one for some reason, i think it gets me in the mood, and it is probably one of my favorite songs i have written, and probably the one i get the most compliments on. urlLink beautiful things - alternate version

do you curse the day i was born in your bed in the fall i'm the blackbird that caws your death the air when you breathe your last breath your secrets loom like a black cloud i can't escape you reign over me you rain over me mother, you bitch am i free? i will not be your possession blame i will not be your possession blame do you spit at the mirror when you see yourself when you see yourself when you see your selfishness was it worth it the cock of your spanish lover do you feel the love inside do you feel anything at all is there anything in there at all? do you know what you have lost you will never have it again. urlLink Apple (instrumental)

i will run you out of this town backwards upside down i will take some time take some time take some time for myself you were the void you were dead excuses buying your time buying your time with lies beneath your feet lies cold concrete your heart and some other pieces of youth nobody will ever know but baby i know, i was inside of you without you knowing i was there underneath your skin and to the left of your heart just like everything else i will run you out of this town backwards upside down i will take some time take some time for myself.

i am a bird flying across this universe if i lost my way i'd fall into the ocean if i lost my love i'd rather sleep with the fishes © Justin Carter Music (bmi)

he had me go down on him i was eleven years old just old enough to know how deep these roots go he took me in the bed he took me in the basement and i said i loved him but i knew he wouldn't these things i will keep these thoughts keep me from sleep these things i will keep these thoughts keep me from sleep and john, he was a big man he chased me around the yard he wanted to cut my hair but i was a death rock boy and i was not his son and he was not my father and he took it all from me and he took my mother these things i will keep these thoughts keep me from sleep these things i will keep these thoughts keep me from sleep notes: this is really an instrumental song, i could never get the vocal track right, but these are the lyrics that were intended for the song. © Justin Carter Music (bmi)

lately i've had these feeling again of death, despair, i'm not going anywhere it could wipe the smile off your face i know it's hard for you to hear these things so hard for you to see me this way but as you have said some things will never change no name when i was an angry young man i had a dream i'd sing these songs in front of a million faces singing along and when all those dreams are gone i will still be this angry man when it's in the blood these things will never change no name these dead eyes will make you cry. © Justin Carter Music (bmi)
© Justin Carter Music (bmi)
© Justin Carter Music (bmi)
i can't breathe i'm so fucked (i'm so fucked) i can't bleed so fuck mother (i'm so fucked) i can't believe i've made another year i'm so fucked i'm so fucked © Justin Carter Music (bmi)

the empty sea is waiting for us the last bag of jane the last kiss and last fuck all so precious had we never had love we never could have lived had we never had love we never could have lived the empty sea is waiting for us the last minute of boredom the lost moments of trust all so perfect had we never had love we never could have lived had we never had love we never could have loved. © Justin Carter Music (bmi)

when i was reading your soul you said thank god it's in japanese i was throwing words and throwing stones to the sea and glass houses i'm a broken aeroplane just looking for something to fall in to just looking for my family roots i'm scared of tornadoes i've lived in one for all these years protecting the family from an unknown truth but who cares and who's listening? ...and in this life of architectual sound something amazing will happen. © Justin Carter Music (bmi)
you are the bad taste in my mouth all black breath and elephants stomping around i'm armed to the teeth and i think you'd be better of dead. © Justin Carter Music (bmi)

welcome to the new site, to listen to the audio content simply click on the song title (wherever you see a green arrow) and it will begin playing shortly. i am still trying to remember a lot of the lyrics to the songs and will updating those as they come back to me. thanks for listening.
